smooth_scaling.description: Sets scaling algorithm for items/icons. false = null = crisp, true = smooth

smooth_map_scaling.description: Sets scaling algorithm for maps. false = crisp, true = null = smooth

allow_deferred_logic_update.description: Set to enable/disable deferred (faster) logic update. Can be overwritten from Lua as Tracker.AllowDeferredLogicUpdate.

disabled_image_filter.description: Set meaning of @disabled in image mods.
